p: Microwave assisted degradation allowed a reduction in operation times and almost did not change the structure and constitutions of the λ-carrageenan [ 162], and κ-carrageenan [ 157] with antiviral properties. However, the special high-pressure equipment needed could be difficult to operate [ 162]. Operation in closed vessels and in open vessel was reported; additionally, operation in domestic devices could be proposed for acid hydrolysis [ 157].
